original_text: They only were hearing it said, “He who used to persecute us is now preaching the faith he once tried to destroy.”
korean_text: 다만 우리를 박해하던 자가 전에 멸하려던 그 믿음을 지금 전한다 함을 듣고

sentences.original_text: They only were hearing it said,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 오직 그렇게 말하는 것을 듣고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He who used to persecute us
